$interpreted: Nolva: Unit-01...let out a wolf's howl?
Nolva: Ah, the flames got smaller!
Nora: I tried using the data I got at that doctor's house to synthesize the voiceprint of a Glimmer Wolf.  Looks like I succeeded.
Nora: This way, we should be able to conduct some basic communication.
Nora: No need to be nervous. We're Kittyeyes' friends...
Nora: ...We're not here to take you back...I want to know why you are setting things on fire all over the prairie.
Nora: I see. So you still can't control your flames?
Nora: He's afraid that he'll hurt Miss Kittyeyes and the others again, so he had no choice but to leave. But...he just...couldn't let go...
Nora: I once had someone like that too.
Nora: I'm fine...Miss Nolva, tell Koll some more about Miss Kittyeyes.
Nolva: Sure...That day, I met Kittyeyes...
Nolva: ……Those bandits came to take their revenge on Roger. They captured Kittyeyes and...
Nolva: Koll, calm down! Kittyeyes has already been rescued and is now safe!
Nora: He's blinded by anger and won't listen to anything...Could it be that those people did something to Koll as well?
Nora: Miss Nolva, we have no choice but to restrain him first.
Nolva: ...Apologies in advance, Koll. Waverlyde! I'll leave it to you...
Nolva: (...My body is so heavy...Is it the side effects of the new medicine?)

Model.Text: I tried using the data I got at that doctor's house to synthesize the voiceprint of a Glimmer Wolf.  Looks like I succeeded.
This way, we should be able to conduct some basic communication.
No need to be nervous. We're Kittyeyes' friends...
...We're not here to take you back...I want to know why you are setting things on fire all over the prairie.
I see. So you still can't control your flames?
He's afraid that he'll hurt Miss Kittyeyes and the others again, so he had no choice but to leave. But...he just...couldn't let go...
I once had someone like that too.
I'm fine...Miss Nolva, tell Koll some more about Miss Kittyeyes.
……Those bandits came to take their revenge on Roger. They captured Kittyeyes and...
Koll, calm down! Kittyeyes has already been rescued and is now safe!
He's blinded by anger and won't listen to anything...Could it be that those people did something to Koll as well?
Miss Nolva, we have no choice but to restrain him first.
...Apologies in advance, Koll. Waverlyde! I'll leave it to you...
(...My body is so heavy...Is it the side effects of the new medicine?)
